thama karana de prasiddhiye kiya ganimata bari widhayaka janadhipathiwarayakuge aathmaya kotharam wakuru wi athda? 2014 wasarehi aluthgama muslim pedes gini thabimata janaya kupithakaramin gnyanasara wisin kiya sitiye muslim minisun abasarana yawimata thama sudanam bawayi.
ee nisa ee nirmala bududahama rakaganima wagema ee bauddha sampradayan aaraksha kara ganimath lankikayan wu apa kageth wagakimak.eyata me warthamana sangha samajaye atham kriyakarakam hethu wenawa.
nikan pukata pastol waduna wage wada karanawa eka digata...
rate thiyena nithiya eekayi.
kolambaa nagaraya sanwardhanaya kirimedi yachakayan, gawayan ha sunakhayan labana masa 3kathulathadi iwath karana bawa mahanagara ha basnahira sanwardhana amathi patali champika ranawaka pawasayi.

jiwithaya sandaha thawarunu kumakdayi saddantha pramanayakin kirimata kalaya.
oluwe kakkuma enakam mama aduwa.
manta eka kannayaka monawa hari wagawak daganna bari wela yam elawalu wargayak mila giyoth kiyanne "mata me sare mechcharak paduyi" kiyala.
pebarawari watupa haththa hathara dahas atasiya dekayi.

mebandu mithrayoda asuru nokala yuththoya.melesa minis samajaye anynyadaththuhara wachiparama anuppiyabhani apaya sahaya yana siwu wargaye mithrayo duru kala yuththoya.nihiyathi puriso nihina sewi nacha bhaye tha kadachi kulyasewi adatta mupana man udeka siwipan thasma aththano uththari bhajetha ( anguththara nikaya)yanadin ki paridi shiladi guna walin nitharama thamata wada usas aya asuru kirima diyunuwata hethu bawa kiyayi.
mewan mulika prashna nosalakaharinna minisa purudu wi sitiyi.
koslande naya yama pilibanda api danatamath ketiyen sandahan kara aththemu.
/ (oba kiyanne bahu wachanayak neda?)
''mama dakka me siddhiyata saka kala ek gatawarayekuge laptop eke asabhya de thibunaya kiyala rupawahini niwedikawak loke thibena barapathalama wipatha wage niwedanaya karanawa.
nasar al athiya toyota wargaye rathayak bhawitha karamin tharagayata sahabhagi wi sitina athara kalos sayins parjo wargaye rathayak bhawitha karamin tharagayata ekwa sitiyi.
mama me lamayata sarlis mastarwa handunwala dennam” yayi ohu lipiyak liya dunneya.
mukuth wadak nathiwa his kompiyutar lab ekaka piti passe hitan inna kenekta..
eewa esema siduwannata aththemaya.
ee mahathata ape pranamaya pala kala yuthuyi.

eda, lalith wirathunga saha anusha palpita mahajana mudal deshapalanika abhilashayakin apaharanaya kirima saha mathaka athi kalayaka pindu singa wadime ‘shilaya’ raka nathi me kiyana bhikshun wahansela owun wenuwen gewiya yuthu rupiyal miliyana 100 illa pindu singa wadima athara apuru samanathwayak thibe.
anna ee kale indalamayi ethumiya mage hithawathiyak une.
ithin me tikamane danuth ahanna wenne...
anik de thamayi.
“me prashnen galawennama barida ? ......“
loka wamanshika wyaparaya padanam wanne maksge darshanaya mathayi.
nanda oone ekekuta kiyagaththuden.

yuwathiyak wiwaha wenakota.muthu mala hathpotak danawa.eeka eyage hisata barak neme.eeken penwanne thamange wath pohosathkama.me amma kiyanawa duwe umbaawa kandagena yanna ahagena ena ayata pennanna mama langa mukuth naha.ee ena ayath ekkama awilla mala wenuwata umbae kara watakaranne duppathkama.aduma gane muna balaganna kannadiyak wath nathi me gedara umbaage adu purawannayi mama meka kale kiyala.eekayi palu kanata numbae asa nogatennayi nokiya palu kanata numbae atha nogatennayi kiwwe.
ekata eyala baya wena hati hari apuruyi.
batha idenakam me aarawula thibiya hakiya.
soda palu wiya.
kotiyak wath watinawa athine...
mewa puluwannam kiyala denna.

ada rata welagath pililayak bandu wu me deshapalana wyawasanayen heta rata galawa ganimi yayi adhishtanayak oba sithata naguna hoth eya athishaya edithara gamanaka mularambhaya wiya haki bawa kiwa haka.

eeth piditha janathawa sambandhayen nam kisima wenasak na.
ohuge palanaya yatathe siduwena mewani hinsakari dewalata aya wiruddhawa nagana handa nisawen wagema ohuge yatihithe thibuna paliganime sithiwilla mudunpath karaganimatath ohu eya yodagaththa..
man thawa yaluwo dennekuth ekka poth bag kihille gahagena hathi dagena duwanawa nuwara oodiyan sinama halata.
eya handunwanu labuwe irahanda pawathnathak kal gowithan kala haki swabhawa dharmayata anukula wu gowithan ratawak hatiyataya.

wadiduratath adahas dak wu rawi karunanayaka mahatha sandahan kale rajya anshayen saha paudgalika anshayen kisidu hingayakin thorawa diwayina pura sitina siyaluma gowinta pohora laba ganimata hakiyawa athi bawayi.

anna ee kattiya wenuwen thamayi mama meka danna hithuwe.
ee wagema me sabandi keti kirima mangin mudal upayannath puluwan.

kuda ath bombayak yanu kuda pramanaye athe randawagatha haki pudgala nashaka awiyak wana athara wisikara damu pasu kshanayakin pipire.
un na meya..giya..
wadidura adahas dakwu ee mahatha,
wadiya mathaka na..

ehi theruma ma widya potha pathehi athi hama deyakma andha bhakthiyen wishwasa karana bawa nowe.

me wana wita nirupanayata amatharawa sinamapatayakin da janapriyathwaya dina sitina athara age aagamanaya saha idiri katayuthu sambandhawa puwathpathakata adahas dakwamin kiya thibune mewannak.

mawa kantakt koraganna nam ithin oya thiyenne bayilawe linkuwa munupothedima mawa allaganta...

nibandhana, pituwa 46 -51 dakwa )
ewita asala siti nuwan mendis idiriyata pamina mage bellata athin gasa, aa parayo tho dannawada katada katha karanne kiya asa, muwa geniyanna kiya makawarayekuta mawa bara dunna.
ethan sita dewiyan wahanse nawatha aarambha kota uthpaththi pothe wistharaya kerena aakarayata paradisayaka swarupayen pruthiwiya prathi nirmanaya kala bawaya.

itha wishwashadayaka aaranchiyak labuna, idiriye karu agamathi wenawa, minisun nodanna de thamayi ohu agamathi wenne ranilge kamaththa uda kiyana eka masa kipayakata pasu nawatha ranilta agamathikama labenawa.

ohuta dakshathawayak hakiyawak thiyenawa.

thawa duratath nolabena de pasupasa hambaayamin , sitha ridawa gatha nohaka, maligayaka kumareku wi , sithu dukin pelemin aadarayak nolaba gewana diwiyakata wada lin pathule sangawi yana gembeku wi , lokaya nodaka miya yanawa sapathaki.
enam kalaaru wanantharaya, wilpaththuwa uthuru abhaya bhumiya, thambowa abhaya bhumiya ha wirakkulichole – eluwankulama yojitha rakshithaya wani wanantharaya.

‘sanhindiyawa‘, sadharanathwaya saha yukthiya kese namudu wathman rajaya wisin parlimenthuwata idiripath karana lada paranagama komisame samajikayin ha warthawe nirdesha sabhapathi hitapu mahadhikarana winisuru makswel paranagama mahatha, sesu samajikayin, manor ramanadan mahathmiya, gisanthi suranjana widyarathna mahatha ,hewahettige hemapala mahatha, dabliw ee thilakarathna rathnayaka mahatha kamituwe lekam lesa ee.dabliw gunadasa mahatha.
pasuwa ema satahan pothe thibu anka pilibanda upa polis parikshaka thissa sugathapala wisin galkissa polis sthanaye polis pothehi satahan thaba atha.
amathaka karanna epa….”

emenma paniya jalaya sandaha pamanak kalin bhawitha kara athi pramanayen litar 18 kata adu nowana paniya jalaya asirima sandaha kalin bhawitha karana lada bahalumak hara, prathichakrikaranaya karana lada plastikwalin sadana lada, asurumak, upakaranayak, bahalumak yoda ganima nokala yuthuya.

kaluthara niyojya polispathi sumith edirisinha, kaluthara kottasa bhara polis adhikari ranjith kodithuwakku yana mahathwarunge upades pita pereda (13 da) sahakara polis adhikari sugath galagamage mahatha parikshana pawathwu athara sugath galagamage mahatha eeye (14 da) sita monaragalata maruwimen pasu sahakara polis adhikari samantha wedage mahathage upades pita kaluthara kottasa bhara lama ha kantha karyanshaye sthanadhipathi polis parikshika malka thushari, dodangoda polis sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka lasantha buddhika yana mahathma mahathmihu athulu polis niladharin pirisak parikshana pawathwathi.
ma samanga warella.
aththatama methana mata godak watinawa.
manda yath dan boho seyin ape rata thula pariganaka bhawitha karannan sitimayi.
mokak hari karala me mala karadaraya nathi karala daාnna oona,yi.
me siyalla nisa polimwala rasthiyadu wenne roginmaya.

hitapu aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahathage niwasata yana athuru margayedi hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha wasaya karana mirihanedi wyaja anka thahadu sahitha suduwan rathayak saha swayankriya giniawiyak samaga siwil andumin sarasuna hamuda sebalun siwudenaku hamuwime siddhiya sambandhawa wirawansha mahatha ese sandahan kaleya.

mage hitha kisima deyakata ida dunne na.
oya kale thibuna thawath tabiloyid tikak thama lakdiwa/hiru/rajaliya...eeta amatharawa kolam paththara thogayakuth aawa.
tichar panthiye hitiye na ne....

mama ee gana nam danne naha.

deshiya parikshanayakata eksath jathinge sahayayuda aparadha chodana sambandhayen pawathwena jathyanthara pramithiyen yuthu wishwasadayi deshiya parikshanayak sandaha shri lankawata sahaya laba dena bawa eksath jathinge...
ada deweni raswim warayaya.
gatawarayo chithrapataye hina hathak mada kiyana githayata thamayi ayata mulinma sammanayak labune.
"api dannema nathuwa api apita aadare karanna patan gaththe oya liyum ganudenuwath ekka..."
nidasunak washayen, niyama nyashtiyak thula, ek ek niyukliyonayak eka witeka nyashtiya pura pathirena sthana bahu pramanayaka sitiyi.
oya pinthure ada gugal eke thibila mamath aasawata dawal sew karagaththa.

eya blogkaruwanta epawu dawasaka eya sahabhagi wana pramanaya aduwi yanu atha.
anika kammale hitiya ne awurudu hatharak ma!
eya asannata, narambaannata entatenmant ekaki.
ee thorathuruwalata anuwa miya yamen pasu aya tika kalak ema niwesema inda thiyenawa.
un ara kandu uda gewal hadan kala thinne oowa.
bhutha ganayata watena amanushyayo kisiseth nopenena athara sitina bawata salakunu athi kirima wisheshayi.
premarathna, shriyani disanayaka, damitha aberathna athulu kalakaruwan rasak medina jothimath jothi rathriya githawath kirimata niyamithaya.satahan - prasad samarathunga

shri lankawata jayagrahanaya sandaha thawath lakunu 221 k lakunu 304 ka jayagrahi ilakkaya hambaa yamin sitina sancharaka shri lanka kandayama thewani dinaya wana ada ( 15 ) tharagaya nathara karana wita siya dewani inima sandaha kadulu 3 k dawi lakunu 83 k laba sitiyeya.
